MSP 35 SE BRD 35 NE BRD 25 SE HIB 10 S CMX 45 W ANJ.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 50 NNE JCT 15 E CRS
15 SSE TXK 15 WSW HOT 30 NNE HRO 25 E COU 40 ESE CDJ 10 SE MKC 25 NW
